title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in long-armed cross, satin, double-running, running back, stem, four-sided and knot stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Unfinished sampler embroidered in polychrome silks, with eleven bands of pattern: confronted horses, addorsed birds, and geometric borders.
